author: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Clarke Quay Pte Ltd v Tan Hun Ling (trading as Sin Lok Cuisine)
coram: Chan Sek Keong CJ; Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA; Tan Lee Meng J
counsel: Pateloo Eruthiyanathan Ashokan (KhattarWong) for the appellant; Subramanian s/o Ayasamy Pillai (Acies Law Corporation) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Landlord and Tenant/Covenants/Tenant having to pay damages for causing fire which spread due to ill-maintained exhaust duct commencing from and serving tenant's demised premises only in landlord's building/Landlord under contractual duty to clean and maintain "all common areas"/Whether landlord breaching such contractual duty by failing to clean and maintain duct/Whether duct part of "common area" in building/Whether landlord having to indemnify tenant for damages payable by tenant
